data.title: Paisan Original 1946 Belgian Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1946 Belgian poster for the film Paisan (Paisa) directed by Roberto Rossellini with Carmela Sazio / Robert Van Loon / Benjamin Emanuel / Raymond Campbell.
